verses.roman:
hena-kāle śrīnivāsa premāviṣṭa-mana
rājāra āge rahi' dekhe prabhura nartana

synonyms: hena-kāle—at this time; śrīnivāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; prema-āviṣṭa-mana—with a greatly ecstatic mind; rājāra āge—in front of the King; rahi'-keeping himself; dekhe—sees; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nartana—the dancing.
translation: While the King beheld the dancing, Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura, standing in front of him, became ecstatic as he saw the dancing of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
